title: Friction Formula
text: Recall the friction formula: f $$=$$ \mu * N.

title: Coefficient of Friction
text: Recall the coefficient of static friction between waxed wood on wet snow is $$0.14$$.

title: Use Newton's Second Law to Calculate Normal Force
text: By Newton's Second Law (F=m*a), we have $$N=m g$$. What is the normal force (in Newtons)? What is $$N=m g=210kg$$ * $$9.8$$ $$\frac{m}{s^2}$$?

title: Solve for f
text: Using the f and \mu that we found, solve for f in newtons. What is f=\mu*N=0.14*2058? (keep $$2$$ digit after the decimal point)
